content.raw:
The mac homebrew [builds are failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/337/) since boost 1.57 has been released as the homebrew default. It looks like another instance of [QTBUG-22829](https://bugreports.qt-project.org/browse/QTBUG-22829) (see pull request #615 for a previous fix).

~~~
Users/jenkins/jenkins.pnmx/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/viewers/moc_ImageView.cxx] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/gui/viewers/CMakeFiles/gazebo_gui_viewers.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
~~~

We will need to wrap some more header file includes in `#ifndef Q_MOC_RUN`
content.html:
The mac homebrew builds are failing since boost 1.57 has been released as the homebrew default. It looks like another instance of QTBUG-22829 (see pull request #615 for a previous fix).

Users/jenkins/jenkins.pnmx/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/viewers/moc_ImageView.cxx] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/gui/viewers/CMakeFiles/gazebo_gui_viewers.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

We will need to wrap some more header file includes in #ifndef Q_MOC_RUN
